requirements.summary: Ensure the public-facing /biodata page renders only the Biodata heading and the two text sections, with no instructor portrait/avatar images in the page body, while leaving the site-wide footer portrait unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting /biodata shows the "Biodata" heading and the two sections ("Professional Summary" and "Core Competencies") without rendering any elements or portrait/avatar images on that page.
The footer contact section (including the existing circular portrait image and its alt text) is unchanged and still appears site-wide as before.
No broken image links or empty image placeholders appear on /biodata.

file_operations.description: Remove any portrait/avatar/instructor photo rendering within the Biodata page content (ensure no or image-based avatar components exist in this routeâ€™s page body) while keeping the existing heading and the two text sections unchanged.
